summary: "Salvator Mundi" is a famous painting that some people think was made by Leonardo da Vinci around 1499-1510. It shows Jesus Christ wearing blue clothes and holding a crystal ball. The painting was lost for a long time and was found again in 2011. Some experts say it's a real Leonardo, but others aren't sure. In 2017, it was sold for $450 million, making it the most expensive painting ever sold. Prince Badr from Saudi Arabia bought it, but it hasn't been seen in public since then. It's now in storage in Saudi Arabia.
title: Salvator Mundi (Leonardo)
